description: Translate only rows having disturbance info or disturbance year greater than 0
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_1 using lists of values. Note that understory disturbance is possible but AB06 and AB16 have no entries.
Copies mod1_yr to DIST_YEAR_1. Values are often zero in ab06.
Maps source attribute to upper extent. Validation catches Nulls, them empty strings which should be treated as Nulls for source integers. Then checks the source value is an integer between 1 and 5.
Maps source attribute to upper extent. Validation catches Nulls, them empty strings which should be treated as Nulls for source integers. Then checks the source value is an integer between 1 and 5.
Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_2 using lists of values
Copies mod1_yr to DIST_YEAR_2. Values are often zero in ab06.
Maps source attribute to upper extent
Maps source attribute to lower extent
